4.2.2 Artificial Neural Networks (ANNs) 
 
 
Artificial Neural Networks (ANNs) are a fascinating and powerful 
type of machine-learning model inspired by the structure and function 
of the human brain [60]. ANNs mainly consist of 3 main layers which are 
the Input Layer, Hidden Layers, and Output Layer as shown in Figure 
4.10. Letâ€™s delve deeper into the intricacies of these networks
